snippet: News outlets are preparing for a televised trial in the shooting death of Trayvon Martin, how Amazon benefits from the lawsuit over e-book prices, and a profile of Andrew Breitbart, the conservative provocateur who was "jacked into the Web early and...
abstract: News outlets are preparing for a televised trial in the shooting death of Trayvon Martin, how Amazon benefits from the lawsuit over e-book prices, and a profile of Andrew Breitbart, the conservative provocateur who was "jacked into the Web early and never unplugged."

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Planning for Zimmerman Trial, and What Breitbart Wrought
